忳字的基本解释

忳
tún
忧郁烦闷：“忳郁邑余侘傺兮。”

忳
zhūn
诚恳的样子：“纷忳忳之愿忠兮。”

忳
dùn
〔忳忳然〕无知的样子，如“不知治乱存亡之所由，忳忳忳犹醉也。”

忳字的汉语字典释义

[①]［tún］
［《廣韻》徒渾切，平魂，定。］
忧郁；烦闷。
[②]［zhūn］
［《集韻》朱倫切，平諄，章。］
同“諄1”。
诚挚。参见“忳2忳”、“忳2誠”。
[③]［dùn］
［《集韻》杜本切，上混，定。］
无知貌。参见“忳3忳”。

忳字的康熙字典解释

【卯集上】【心字部】　忳； 康熙笔画：8； 页码：页378第19
【廣韻】【集韻】【韻會】徒渾切【正韻】徒孫切，?音屯。【玉篇】悶也，亂也，憂也。【屈原·離騷】忳鬰邑余侘傺兮。【朱註】忳，憂貌。　又【集韻】朱倫切，音肫。本作諄。或作忳。忳忳，誨人不倦也。　又【集韻】【正韻】?殊倫切，音純。本作憌。或作忳。人名。後漢有王忳。　又【集韻】【類篇】?杜本切，音盾。愚也。　又都困切，音頓。或作沌。【老子·道德經】我愚人之心也哉，忳忳兮。　又【集韻】徒困切，音鈍。忳愻，意不樂也。◎按肫與忳通。凡字書所引，通義甚多，《正字通》所引亦多，而獨于忳肫二字不許其通，是自相矛盾也。凡正字通辨駁太過類此。

["Guangyun" is full of excitement, calm soul, set. ]
Melancholy; bored.
[②]［zhūn］
["Jiyun" Zhu Lunqie, flat and simple, chapter. ]
Same as "谆1".
sincere. See "忳2忳", "忳2诚".

[Mao Ji 1] [Heart Word Department] 　忳; Kangxi Strokes: 8; Page Number: Page 378 Page 19
[Guangyun] [Jiyun] [Yunhui] Tuhunqie [Zhengyun] Tusunqie,? Yintun. [Jade articles] Boring, chaotic, and worrying. 【Qu Yuan·Lisao】Wu Lai Yi Yu Wah Sui Xi. [Zhu Note] 忳, worry about appearance.　[Jiyun] Zhu Lunqie, sound gizzard. This is a boon. Or make up. Uneasy, instructive people are also tireless.　 [Ji Yun] [Zheng Yun]? Unique and cut, pure sound. This is a shame. Or make up. Person's name. There was Wang Yu in the Later Han Dynasty.　[Jiyun] [Class Chapter]? Du Benqie, Yindun. Fool too.　It's all sleepy again, the sound stops. Or make chaos. [Lao Tzu·Tao De Jing] I am foolish and perplexed.　[Jiyun] It’s just sleepy and dull. Feeling unhappy, too. ◎Press gizzard and confuse. There are many common meanings quoted in the book of Fanzi, and there are also many quotes in "Zhengzitong", but the two characters alone are not allowed to be used, which is self-contradictory.
